Text: OR Parcel s Released for Columbia Energy March Forwarded by Clarissa GarciaHOUECT on AM on PM To cc Porter Jeffrey Herzog Hans Kinney Doug Perrone Brian Subject OR Parcel s Released for Columbia Energy March Hey there Tennessee Please forward this to Chris Germany I am unsure of his correct email address I am forwarding the released parcel s for March from OR Thanks

Tennesse Zn Forwarded by Clarissa GarciaHOUECT on AM on PM To Phillip NRON Clarissa CT cc Bartlo Noel Jones Donna Flewellyn Melissa Perrone Brian Swogger Joanne Subject Tennesse Zn An afterthought here I should have used the term displacement as we would not be officially bringing in more gas into their system Forwarded by Marianne StilesCESColumbiaGas on PM Marianne Stiles PM To internet internet cc Joanne olumbiaGas Brian olumbiaGas Melissa olumbiaGas Donna olumbiaGas Noel olumbiaGas Subject Tennesse Zn Need your assistance Obviously I need your expertise on Tennessee and someones on Transco We need to get gas to S Ct and Ct Natural citygates for February Heres a what ifI just spoke with a Tennessee rep to ask about Transco Rivervale and Tennessee They are currently allowing short hauls at this point However could we bring in some Transco at Rivervale and do a short haul on Tennessee Mawaw spelling As of today I was told it could flow to the above citygate meters although this could change overnight I know we did this a few times last winter also How does Transco look for this As you can tell I am not even aware of the economics If this would work what would it cost Can you check with Chris I dont know his email address

volumesForwarded by Clarissa GarciaHOUECT on AM on AM To Phillip NRON Clarissa CT cc Subject volumes No changes on my ldcs for tomorrow However I did try to anticipate the weekend changes to give you some advance notice Also please be aware that if the customers comsumption changes I have a firm obligation to adjust my noms I hope this is helpful tnxls

Re CES TGP FEB SUPPLYForwarded by Clarissa GarciaHOUECT on AM on AM To Clarissa CT cc Subject Re CES TGP FEB SUPPLY SCG volume thru is zero Forwarded by Donna JonesCESColumbiaGas on AM Donna Jones AM To cc Subject Re CES TGP FEB SUPPLY One change Please increase Boston to Thanks Enron Supply TGPxls ATTKHN

CES TGP FEB SUPPLYForwarded by Clarissa GarciaHOUECT on PM on PM To Clarissa CT cc Phillip NRON Subject CES TGP FEB SUPPLY From now on Ill send you this information for my LDCs Please call me to discuss format deadlines whatever I can do to help our communications Enron Supply TGPxls

FW TCO CAPACITY ALLOCTIMELY NOM CYCLE FEBRUARY fyi Original Message From mailto Sent Monday February PM To Subject TCO CAPACITY ALLOCTIMELY NOM CYCLE FEBRUARY COLUMBIA GAS TRANSMISSION CORPORATION NOTICE TO ALL INTERESTED PARTIES FEBRUARY Notice ID NO RESPONSE REQUIRED SUBJECT CAPACITY ALLOCTIMELY NOMINATION CYCLE FOR FEBRUARY PLEASE NOTE THAT ALL ALLOCATIONS ARE SUBJECT TO CHANGE BASED ON THE RECEIPT OF ANY NEW NOMINATIONS OR INTRADAY NOMINATIONS RECEIPTS TENNESSEE Customers shipping on contracts having primary points of Dungannon Highland and Unionville must utilize these points DELIVERIES MARKET AREAS AND There is no capacity for ITS customers There is no capacity for secondary firm customers MARKET AREAS AND There is no capacity for ITS customers There is no capacity for secondary firm customers MARKET AREA There is no capacity for ITS customers There is no capacity for secondary firm customers MARKET AREA There is no capacity for ITS customers There is no capacity for secondary firm customers Excess MDWQ NOT Available ISS Withdrawals NOT Available SIT Withdrawals NOT Available Imbalance Drawdowns NOT Available Excess MDIQ Available ISS Injections Available SIT Injections Available Imbalance Paybacks Available PAL LendsUnparks NOT Available PAL ParksLoan Paybacks Available Call Gas Control hours in advance at to request approval Columbia Gas Transmission has completed allocating all of its receipt and delivery points for the gas day of February You may now view the quantities you are authorized to flow on February On the Internet NAVIGATOR view Nominations Scheduled Quantity Scheduled Quantity for Service RequestorSummary Nominations to be Viewed and select Reduced Nominations The quantities confirmed to flow for your account are available on the Internet NAVIGATOR after pm Eastern Time on Monday February If you have any questions please contact your Account Representative

FW CGT Capacity Auctionsfyi Original Message From mailto Sent Tuesday February AM To Subject CGT Capacity Auctions COLUMBIA GULF TRANSMISSION COMPANY NOTICE TO ALL INTERESTED PARTIES FEBRUARY Notice ID NO RESPONSE REQUIRED Columbia Gulf Transmission is auctioning the following firm capacity available March Mainline capacity at dthd from Rayne Louisiana to Leach Kentucky at CGTs maximum FTS transportation rate Onshore capacity at dthd from Venice to Rayne Louisiana at CGTs maximum onshore FTS transportation rate Offshore capacity at dthd from South Pass to Egan Louisiana at CGTs maximum offshore FTS transportation rate Bids must be received by pm Central Time February Details of these capacity auctions may be found in the Columbia NAVIGATOR system under the capacity release folder offer numbers and respectively For additional information please contact Janice Felton at Steve Wendel at or Brian Lamb at
